DocumentationDemoArticle.Title: Some of my element settings originate from a configuration file, so many other formatters can use them the way I do

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: My default element settings come from the configuration file for common element settings. But I change the default value to trim this text in my configuraion file to 500 characters.
